name: Shield: Call of Police Training
description:
Major updates. Shoot like Morpheus in Matrix? Free Glock 18c only today!!

What's new:
*All modes now are FREE to unlock!
*All levels can be unlocked with 90% discount!
*Free bullets
*Retina support

***********************************************
* Average user rating: 4.5 / 5!
* 5 stars from 80 percent of users!
* "A fun game to play!" - by Slide To Play
* Featured on AppAddict.net
************************************************

You will LOVE this game if you...

- Trigger Happy.
- Love Sniping!.
- Enjoyed playing Overkill, Contract Killer, Eliminate: Gun Range, or Wild West Guns.
- Enjoyed playing the original Police Trainer arcade game in the past.


P.P.T. was the most challenging and intense shooting game on the AppStore in 2009. Now Shield: Call of Police Training is here with more challenges, more modes, more weapons, more items, and of course more fun and mind-blowing moments.


FEATURES:
*Retina display support
*9 game modes each with 11 levels
*Challenge mode with global ranking
*Zombie invasion mode
*Berretta, Glock 18c, Magnum and more to come
*12 Perks to customize your weapon
*11 RANKS from Rookie to Sheriff
*56 Achievements and 6 Leaderboards to keep you entertained.
*Plenty of targets to shoot
*Plenty of ZOMBIES to shoot

Store and Credits:
You can buy tons of items from the in-game store with Credits or Points.

**********************************
** Where to get FREE Credits and Points? **
**********************************
There are many ways that you can get FREE Credits and Points EVERY DAY!

--Come back daily to earn 1 Credit
--Share your progress on Facebook to earn 1 Credit
--Like our Facebook fanpage to earn 10 Credits
--Tweet your progress daily to earn 1 Credit
--Follow us on Twitter to earn 10 Credits
--Register to Zing Games account to earn 10 Credits
--Watch short trailers to earn 1000 Points
--Check in Heyzap to earn 1000 Points

How many free points you can get on the first day?

Total 72000 Points!!!!

Also share all your achievements with friends, and you will get extra 56 Credits while playing!

Note: Shield: Call of Police Training is compatible with iOS 5.0 and above.
